path: books/Introduction to Probability, Statistics, and Random Processes/1.5.0/7

attr.a:
a. Countable. Subset of countable set is countable. This is subset of $`\mathbb{N}`$.

b. Countable. Product of countable sets is countable.

c. Uncountable. Open set of Uclidean space is uncountable.
attr.q:
Determine whether each of the following sets is countable or uncountable.

a. $`A = \{ 1,2,\cdots ,10^{10} \}`$  
b. $`B=\{a+b\sqrt{2}|\quad a,b \in \mathbb{Q}\}`$  
c. $`C=\{(X,Y) \in \mathbb{R}^2 |\quad x^2+y^2 \leq 1\}`$
